languages.text: Отступив, мятежники заняли оборону в своих тренировочных лагерях, скрытых на поросшем лесами архипелаге. Благословенн{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан рассмотрел{mf||а} несколько тактик обнаружения этих гнезд смуты и избрал{mf||а} наиболее перспективную.

traits.locale_text: Отступив, мятежники заняли оборону в своих тренировочных лагерях, скрытых на поросшем лесами архипелаге. Благословенн{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан рассмотрел{mf||а} несколько тактик обнаружения этих гнезд смуты и избрал{mf||а} наиболее перспективную.

languages.text: After retreating, the rebels took up the defence of their training camps, which were hidden deep in the forests of the archipelago. The blessed Lord Captain reviewed several approaches for rooting out these nests of sedition and chose the most promising one.
languages.original_text: Отступив, мятежники заняли оборону в своих тренировочных лагерях, скрытых на поросшем лесами архипелаге. Благословенн{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан рассмотрел{mf||а} несколько тактик обнаружения этих гнезд смуты и избрал{mf||а} наиболее перспективную.

traits.locale_text: After retreating, the rebels took up the defense of their training camps, which were hidden deep in the forests of the archipelago. The blessed Lord Captain reviewed several approaches for rooting out these nests of sedition and chose the most promising one.

After retreating, the rebels took up the defense of their training camps, which were hidden deep in the forests of the archipelago. The blessed Lord Captain reviewed several approaches for rooting out these nests of sedition and chose the most promising one.

After retreating, the rebels took up the defence of their training camps, which were hidden deep in the forests of the archipelago. The blessed Lord Captain reviewed several approaches for rooting out these nests of sedition and chose the most promising one.

languages.text: 退却した反乱軍は訓練キャンプの防衛にとりかかった。このキャンプは群島にある森の奥深くに隠されていた。こうした反乱軍の巣を一掃するため、祝福受けしロード・キャプテンはいくつかのアプローチを重ねて検討し、最も成功率が高いものを採用した。
languages.original_text: After retreating, the rebels took up the defence of their training camps, which were hidden deep in the forests of the archipelago. The blessed Lord Captain reviewed several approaches for rooting out these nests of sedition and chose the most promising one.

traits.locale_text: 退却した反乱軍は訓練キャンプの防衛にとりかかった。このキャンプは群島にある森の奥深くに隠されていた。こうした反乱軍の巣を一掃するため、祝福受けしロード・キャプテンはいくつかのアプローチを重ねて検討し、最も成功率が高いものを採用した。

languages.text: 叛军撤退之后，便隐藏在群岛森林深处，以森林深处的训练营地为基地，进行防御作战。神皇保佑的舰长大人审核了几种可以根除叛军巢穴的方式，并选择了最有把握的一种。
languages.original_text: After retreating, the rebels took up the defence of their training camps, which were hidden deep in the forests of the archipelago. The blessed Lord Captain reviewed several approaches for rooting out these nests of sedition and chose the most promising one.

traits.locale_text: 叛军撤退之后，便隐藏在群岛森林深处，以森林深处的训练营地为基地，进行防御作战。神皇保佑的舰长大人审核了几种可以根除叛军巢穴的方式，并选择了最有把握的一种。

languages.text: Tras batirse en retirada, los rebeldes se hicieron fuertes en sus campos de entrenamiento, ocultos en las profundidades del bosque del archipiélago. {mf|El bendito Lord Capitán|La bendita Lord Capitán} sopesó diversas estrategias para erradicar esos nidos de sedición y se decantó por la más prometedora.
languages.original_text: After retreating, the rebels took up the defence of their training camps, which were hidden deep in the forests of the archipelago. The blessed Lord Captain reviewed several approaches for rooting out these nests of sedition and chose the most promising one.

traits.locale_text: Tras batirse en retirada, los rebeldes se hicieron fuertes en sus campos de entrenamiento, ocultos en las profundidades del bosque del archipiélago. {mf|El bendito Lord Capitán|La bendita Lord Capitán} sopesó diversas estrategias para erradicar esos nidos de sedición y se decantó por la más prometedora.

languages.text: Nach ihrem Rückzug kümmerten sich die Rebellen um die Verteidigung ihrer Ausbildungslager, die sich tief in den Wäldern des Archipels verbargen. Der gesegnete Lord Captain erwog mehrere Ansätze, diese Nester der Abspaltung auszuheben, und wählte den vielversprechendsten.
languages.original_text: After retreating, the rebels took up the defence of their training camps, which were hidden deep in the forests of the archipelago. The blessed Lord Captain reviewed several approaches for rooting out these nests of sedition and chose the most promising one.

traits.locale_text: Nach ihrem Rückzug kümmerten sich die Rebellen um die Verteidigung ihrer Ausbildungslager, die sich tief in den Wäldern des Archipels verbargen. Der gesegnete Lord Captain erwog mehrere Ansätze, diese Nester der Abspaltung auszuheben, und wählte den vielversprechendsten.

languages.text: Après leur repli, les rebelles s'attelèrent à défendre leurs camps d'entraînement, dissimulés au cœur des forêts de l'archipel. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} étudia différentes approches visant à éradiquer ces nids de révolte et choisit la plus prometteuse.
languages.original_text: After retreating, the rebels took up the defence of their training camps, which were hidden deep in the forests of the archipelago. The blessed Lord Captain reviewed several approaches for rooting out these nests of sedition and chose the most promising one.

traits.locale_text: Après leur repli, les rebelles s'attelèrent à défendre leurs camps d'entraînement, dissimulés au cœur des forêts de l'archipel. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} étudia différentes approches visant à éradiquer ces nids de révolte et choisit la plus prometteuse.

languages.text: Geri çekilen isyancılar, eğitim kamplarının savunmaya koyuldu. Bu kamplar, adalardaki ormanların derinliklerinde konuşlanmıştı. Yüce Lord Kaptan, bu ihanet yuvalarının kökünü kurutmak için birkaç yaklaşımı gözden geçirip en münasip olanı seçti.
languages.original_text: After retreating, the rebels took up the defence of their training camps, which were hidden deep in the forests of the archipelago. The blessed Lord Captain reviewed several approaches for rooting out these nests of sedition and chose the most promising one.

traits.locale_text: Geri çekilen isyancılar, eğitim kamplarının savunmaya koyuldu. Bu kamplar, adalardaki ormanların derinliklerinde konuşlanmıştı. Yüce Lord Kaptan, bu ihanet yuvalarının kökünü kurutmak için birkaç yaklaşımı gözden geçirip en münasip olanı seçti.
